languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, проктор Антар вмешивается в работу экипажа. Он запугивает и шантажирует команду, требуя доступ к закрытым архивам корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, проктор Антар вмешивается в работу {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}астропатического хора{/g}. Он запугивает, шантажирует и терроризирует команду".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, проктор Антар вмешивается в работу экипажа. Он запугивает и шантажирует команду, требуя доступ к закрытым архивам корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the Astropathic Choir. He is intimidating, threatening, and terrorising the crew."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the Astropathic Choir. He is intimidating, threatening, and terrorising the crew."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."

languages.text: 「陛下、アンサール代理人がクルーの仕事に干渉しています。彼はクルーを威圧し、脅しており、船の封印された資料庫へのアクセスを要求しています」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、アンサール代理人がクルーの仕事に干渉しています。彼はクルーを威圧し、脅しており、船の封印された資料庫へのアクセスを要求しています」
「陛下、アンサール代理人が感応通信聖歌隊の業務に干渉しています。彼はクルーを威圧し、脅迫し、恐怖に陥れているのです」

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Anthar, Astropatik Koro'nun işlerine karışıyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Mürettebatı tehdit edip korkutuyor ve geminin mühürlü arşivlerine erişim talep ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen Anthar, Astropatik Koro'nun işlerine karışıyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Mürettebatı tehdit edip korkutuyor ve geminin mühürlü arşivlerine erişim talep ediyor."
"Üsteğmen Anthar, Astropatik Koro'nun işlerine karışıyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Mürettebatı tehdit edip korkutuyor."

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el Procurador Anthar interfiere en el funcionamiento de la tripulación. Está intimidando y amenazando a nuestra gente, exigiendo acceder a los archivos sellados de la nave».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el Procurador Anthar interfiere en el funcionamiento de la tripulación. Está intimidando y amenazando a nuestra gente, exigiendo acceder a los archivos sellados de la nave».

languages.text: “舰长大人，安萨监察官正在妨碍星语唱诗班的正常工作。他正在恐吓、威胁您的船员，要求查阅船上的保密档案。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，安萨监察官正在妨碍星语唱诗班的正常工作。他正在恐吓、威胁您的船员，要求查阅船上的保密档案。”
“舰长大人，安萨监察官正在妨碍星语唱诗班的正常工作。他正在恐吓、威胁、恫吓您的船员。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, le proctor Anthar perturbe les activités de l'équipage. Il use d'intimidations et de menaces pour obtenir l'accès aux archives scellées du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, le proctor Anthar perturbe les activités de l'équipage. Il use d'intimidations et de menaces pour obtenir l'accès aux archives scellées du vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Proktor Anthar mischt sich in die Arbeit der Crew ein. Er schüchtert sie ein und bedroht sie, um Zugang zu den versiegelten Archiven des Schiffs zu erhalten."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Proctor Anthar is interfering in the work of the crew. He is intimidating and threatening them, demanding access to the ship's sealed archives."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Proktor Anthar mischt sich in die Arbeit der Crew ein. Er schüchtert sie ein und bedroht sie, um Zugang zu den versiegelten Archiven des Schiffs zu erhalten."
